scripts.bootstrap: npm install; lerna bootstrap; npm run compile
scripts.compile: npm run clean; lerna exec --parallel -- babel-flow src --out-dir lib; (cd packages/generator-default; npm run wrappers-compile)
scripts.watch: npm run clean; lerna exec --parallel -- babel-flow src --out-dir lib --watch & (cd packages/generator-default; npm run wrappers-watch) & wait
scripts.publish: npm run compile; lerna exec -- npm publish
